pages.title: Requesting items
pages.text:
When standing near the $(l:1_items/index)&1Corporea Index&0$(/l) you can request items from any inventory in the network, just by typing it in chat.But there is a simpler way. While looking at your inventory, recipes or &4JEI&0, hover over an item and press
• &4&l$(k:nei.options.keys.gui.botania_corporea_request)&0&r to request &41&0 item
• &4&lCTRL+SHIFT+$(k:nei.options.keys.gui.botania_corporea_request)&0&r for &416&0
• &4&lCTRL+$(k:nei.options.keys.gui.botania_corporea_request)&0&r for &432&0
• &4&lSHIFT+$(k:nei.options.keys.gui.botania_corporea_request)&0&r for &464&0
You need to place a $(l:1_items/spark)&5Corporea Spark&0$(/l) on the index to link it to a network.
